{
    "sql": "CREATE TABLE t(`id` UInt32) ENGINE = MergeTree ORDER BY id; INSERT INTO t (`id`) VALUES (1); SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t ARRAY JOIN range(2) AS a; SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t ARRAY JOIN [0,1] AS a; SELECT COUNT(a) FROM t ARRAY JOIN range(2) AS a; SELECT COUNT(a) FROM t ARRAY JOIN [0,1] AS a;",
    "Affected Elements": "COUNT(*), ARRAY JOIN",
    "Root Cause Analysis": "The use of COUNT(*) with ARRAY JOIN does not account for the expanded rows generated by the join, leading to incorrect aggregation results."
}
